mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num,writer,title,orgFileName,saveFileName, fileSize,regdate FROM mk_file
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' OR orgFileName LIKE '%'||#{orgFileName}||'%'
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
WHERE writer LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%'
ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM mk_file
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%' OR orgFileName LIKE '%'||#{orgFileName}||'%'
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
WHERE writer LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mk_file (num, writer, title, orgFileName, saveFileName, fileSize, regdate) VALUES(mk_file_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{orgFileName}, #{saveFileName}, #{fileSize}, SYSDATE)
